title: 'See expiration date'
body: This shampoo seems to be good for my hair so far. The 1litre bottle is sold at a very low price because it's expiration date is near so be aware of it. Eg. 1litre bottle sold at rs384 has a use by date on 02 Feb 2024. Seem the product listing on 15 July 2023 so if you have brought it in the prime sale the use by date ends in 7 month becareful of it.

title: 'They changed the main buying reason'
